install.name: Store Locator
install.description:
This module will displays a Google map of store locations.
Learn how to create this extension and many others in Advanced Joomla from APress:
/modules/mod_storelocator/advanced_joomla_cover.jpg

param.name: center_latitude
param.label: Map center latitude
param.description: Display map with this latitude at the center.

param.name: center_longitude
param.label: Map center longitude
param.description: Display map with this longitude at the center.

field.name: center_latitude
field.label: Map center latitude
field.description: Display map with this latitude at the center.

field.name: center_longitude
field.label: Map center longitude
field.description: Display map with this longitude at the center.
